### load libraries
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library(palmerpenguins)
```

### find dimensions of `penguins`
```{r}
glimpse(penguins)
```
### find variables in `penguins`
```{r}
names(penguins)
```


### how many individuals sampled on each island?
```{r}
table(penguins$island)
```
```{r}
summary(penguins$island)
```

### find the mean body mass of all penguins
```{r}
mean(penguins$body_mass_g, na.rm = T)
```
